name: PDF Chat bot
description:
The PDF Chatbot is a personal AI-driven project designed to enhance document accessibility by converting PDF files into searchable text and enabling users to ask context-aware questions based on the extracted content. Hosted on Streamlit, the chatbot leverages Google Generative AI, LangChain, and LangChain-Community for intelligent conversational capabilities. It uses PyPDF2 for PDF processing and ChromaDB & FAISS-CPU as vector databases for efficient information retrieval. The integration of Python-Dotenv ensures seamless environment configuration.

Key Features:
  • PDF to Searchable Text - Converts PDFs into searchable and processable text.
  • Context-Aware Chatbot - Users can ask questions based on extracted content.
  • Powered by AI - Uses Google Generative AI and LangChain for intelligent responses.
  • Efficient Information Retrieval - Utilizes ChromaDB & FAISS-CPU as vector databases.
  • PDF Processing - Extracts text using PyPDF2.
  • Seamless Deployment - Hosted on Streamlit with environment management via Python-Dotenv.
This project simplifies knowledge extraction from large documents, making information retrieval faster, smarter, and more user-friendly.

name: E-Clinic
description:
The E-Clinic project is a digital healthcare platform designed for secure medical record storage and prescription management. It integrates Aadhar to provide hospitals with emergency access to a patient's medical history, aiding treatment during critical situations. Future enhancements include Blockchain for immutable data security.

Technologies Used:
  • Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Backend: Django Framework, Django REST Framework
  • Database: MySQL
  • Version Control: Git, GitHub

Key Features:
  • Prescription Upload: Users can securely store medical prescriptions.
  • Aadhar Integration: Links medical records for universal accessibility.
  • Blockchain Security (Upcoming): Ensures tamper-proof data storage.
  • Medical Reminders: Alerts for timely medication intake.
  • Emergency Access: Hospitals can retrieve patient history in critical cases.
This project aims to enhance healthcare efficiency with centralized, secure, and accessible medical records.
